intro: The futuristic Human City has been plunged into crisis by an invasion of AI robots. You are the only hope to take back the city! Fight against AI domination in exciting FPS!
description:
Experience intense battles against state-of-the-art AI drones and giant robots! Exhilarating action awaits as you use a variety of weapons to blast your enemies in spectacular fashion! We invite you to join the pulse-pounding battles that unfold on dynamic battlefields!

・ An evolutionary weapon system worthy of the Gunfire title allows for a unique weapon experience where performance improves and new features are added the more you use them!
・ There is an auto-fire assist system for FPS beginners! However, it reduces DPS compared to manual firing, so use it strategically!
・ Evolving AI enemies appear! Experience intelligent combat against AI enemies that learn and adapt.
・ Craft your own firearms using loot materials.
・ Collect and upgrade various weapons to build your own powerful arsenal!
・ Strategically choose the optimal weapons and equipment for each mission to grasp the key to victory.
・ Feel the excitement of growth as you upgrade your character and weapons.
・ A story mode with huge maps and varied stages for hours of enjoyment!
・ Multiple story branches that change based on your choices.
・ Fight on a variety of battlefields, from city streets to underground bunkers and skyscrapers.
・ Customize your character with skill trees!
・ Experience more immersive battlefield action with the AI companion system, which allows you to fight cooperatively with AI teammates!
・ Enjoy a multiplayer-like feel as you fight alongside AI companions using support equipment.

You are humanity's last hope! Can you suppress the AI rebellion and reclaim Human City? Download [Gunfire: AI Rebellion] now and take back the city from the AIs!

Prologue
As the mayor of Human City, you have fallen victim to the cunning schemes of the AI Robot City, and lost half of your city. Stripped of everything and exiled due to riots by enraged citizens, you now have only one way to restore your honor and reclaim the city: destroy the AI base. Your choices will determine the fate of humanity. Liberate Human City from AI domination and regain your lost honor.
